article_title: No health coverage? That’s about to get more expensive
article_text:
Total Access

Enjoy the convenience of home delivery plus Digital D. Sign up for our BEST VALUE today!

article_metadata.description: Whether your resistance to signing up for health coverage has been rooted in principle or financial necessity, know this: Going without that coverage is about to get a lot more expensive. Hundreds of thousands of uninsured Ohioans risk triggering a much larger penalty for not having coverage in 2016 than they faced for going without it this year.
